channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: The Incredible Journey
channel.desc: In the early 20th century, England and Australia produced some of the world's greatest pioneering aviators. Among them were Amy Johnson, the first woman to fly solo from England to Australia, and C. W. A. Scott (Charles William Anderson Scott), a record-breaking pilot whose daring flights captured global attention. Their stories are marked by courage, determination, and astonishing leaps of faith.
